resources.string: Advanced settings (change options after stopping music)
* Click on the lyrics to switch the clock and lyrics
Auto hide lock screen carrier name
* Custom Hook (do not move if you don\'t understand)
Mainly responsible for Hook and UI
Thank you list (in no particular order)

Applicable situation：
 - APlayer Unknown ~ 1.5.7.9(Status bar lyrics version)
 - QQMusic Unknown ~ 11.0.1.6(Status bar lyrics version)
 - MiguMusic Unknown ~7.9.0(Car Bluetooth Lyric Version)
 - Netease 8.2 10 ~ now(Status bar lyrics version)
 - Netease unknown ~ 8.0 40(Car Bluetooth Lyric Version)
 - KugouMusic Unknown ~ 11.0.8(Car Bluetooth Lyric Version)
 - KuwoMusic Unknown ~ 10.0.7.0(Car Bluetooth Lyric Version)
 - SaltPlayer 4.5 ~ now(API version)
 - MeizuMusic Unknown ~ Unknown(Status bar lyrics version)
If the lyrics cannot be displayed, please try to stop the music software and restart the SystemUI\n or check the instructions for use. Are you using the correct version?
Failed to get the latest version download address:
Check failed, please try again later!
Please enter the hexadecimal color code, for example: #C0C0C0
Are you sure to restart the system interface?
If you suddenly find that you cannot use it during use, you can try to restart the SystemUI.
Do you want to reset the module
The module is OK, please don\'t reset it at will

Module notes

 The module is perfectly used in the official Rom, the official change may be unusable or problematic


If the lyrics cannot be displayed
 Please restart the system interface and make sure the module switch is turned on
 Please make sure to set the lyrics in the StatusBar or Bluetooth lyrics in the car to turn on in the music software


The function changes with * need to restart the system interface


If the module does not take effect, please open debug and restart SystemUI, attach the log, and go to GitHub Telegram for feedback
This module is not activated, please activate this module in Lsposed\nThis module only supports the latest version of Lsposed
Please enter Base 64 without prefix, recommended pixel size is 32*32
This function is embedded in the system UI and may cause the system UI to crash and restart!

yyyy: year
 MM: month
 dd: day
 hh: 1~12 hour clock (1-12)
 HH: 24-hour clock (0-23)
 mm: minutes
 ss: seconds
 E: day of the week
 a: morning and afternoon signs
 z: indicates the time zone
 To display custom text, fill in the edit box below
 Current format:
Input custom hook, Input empty of off
Hook SystemUI failed\nThis SystemUI does not support, the author of the packaged SystemUI
